experience.title: Math & Stats Peer Tutor
experience.description: Conducted drop-in homework help sessions for groups of 10-25 students, clarifying complex concepts in math and computer science courses to improve their understanding and problem-solving skills.
achievements: Demonstrated leadership skills by running tutoring sessions and fostering a supportive environment conducive to learning.
Tailored support to each student's needs by assessing their proficiency levels in course content, ensuring efficient and equitable distribution of time.
